content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills positioned at (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- Collection chests at (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters at (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) for material transport
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining Station at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining both iron and copper ore
- Collection chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) for transport
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) containing processed plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Collection chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
All drills currently out of fuel

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for material transport
Connected by transport belt system

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Power generation setup with:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to extraction operations
- Cannot extract from entities that don't contain the requested item
- Ensure target chest/entity contains the item before attempting extraction

### Entity fuel management issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel
- Ensure mining drills are fueled before operation
- Set up automated fuel delivery systems for continuous operation

### Fluid system connectivity issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning
- Ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and steam engine
- Verify fluid flow direction in pipe networks

### Space management in storage
- Chest at (-5.5,-55.5) is full, blocking further operations
- Monitor chest capacity and implement overflow protection
- Set up multiple storage options or faster item extraction
